title: Marjorie's rich fruit cake
ingredients: ['175g (6 oz) butter, room temperature', '175g (6 oz) soft dark brown sugar', '280g (10 oz) self-raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon mixed spice', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3 medium eggs', '1 tablespoon golden syrup or black treacle', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon brandy', '500g (18 oz) mixed dried fruit', '110g (4 oz) glace cherries - halved, rinsed and dried', 'brandy for adding after cooking']
